meanings.definition: Lacking in refinement or good manners.
meanings.sent1: The lowbred man spoke loudly in the quiet library.
meanings.sent2: She found his lowbred behavior embarrassing at the fancy dinner party.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lowbred ways, he always made everyone laugh with his jokes.
meanings.sent4: Her taste in music was so lowbred, it was like listening to nails on a chalkboard.
meanings.sent5: The lowbred dog barked incessantly, disrupting the peaceful neighborhood.

meanings.sent1: The lowbred horse struggled to keep up with the purebred racehorses.
meanings.sent2: People often looked down on her for her lowbred background.
meanings.sent3: Despite his lowbred origins, he worked hard to achieve success in his career.
meanings.sent4: The lowbred plants in the garden wilted quickly in the harsh sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The lowbred cat wandered the streets, searching for scraps of food.
